senses: [{"definition":"A higher-pitched or stronger articulation of a particular syllable of a word or phrase in order to distinguish it from the others or to emphasize it.","example":"In the word \"careful\", the accent is placed on the first syllable."},{"definition":"Emphasis or importance in general.","example":"At this hotel, the accent is on luxury."},{"definition":"A mark or character used in writing, in order to indicate the place of the spoken accent, or to indicate the nature or quality of the vowel marked.","example":"The name C\u00e9zanne is written with an acute accent."},{"definition":"Modulation of the voice in speaking; the manner of speaking or pronouncing; a peculiar or characteristic modification of the voice, expressing emotion; tone.","example":null},{"definition":"The distinctive manner of pronouncing a language associated with a particular region, social group, etc., whether of a native speaker or a foreign speaker; the phonetic and phonological aspects of a dialect.","example":"a broad Irish accent"},{"definition":"(sign languages) A distinctive manner of producing a sign language, such as someone who does not normally use a certain sign language might have when using it.","example":"2015 December 3, [.\/http\/\/www.pri.org\/stories\/2015-12-03\/philadelphia-accent-sign-language There's a distinctly Philadelphia accent in American Sign Language]"},{"definition":"A word; a significant tone or sound.","example":null},{"definition":"(usually plurale tantum) Expressions in general; speech.","example":null},{"definition":"Stress laid on certain syllables of a verse.","example":null},{"definition":"A regularly recurring stress upon the tone to mark the beginning, and, more feebly, the third part of the measure.","example":null},{"definition":"A special emphasis of a tone, even in the weaker part of the measure.","example":null},{"definition":"The rhythmical accent, which marks phrases and sections of a period.","example":null},{"definition":"The expressive emphasis and shading of a passage.","example":null},{"definition":"A mark used to represent specific stress on a note.","example":null},{"definition":"A mark placed at the right hand of a letter, and a little above it, to distinguish magnitudes of a similar kind expressed by the same letter, but differing in value, as y', y''.","example":null},{"definition":"A mark at the right hand of a number, indicating minutes of a degree, seconds, etc., as in 12' 27'', meaning twelve minutes and twenty-seven seconds.","example":null},{"definition":"A mark used to denote feet and inches, as in 6' 10'', meaning six feet ten inches.","example":null},{"definition":"Emphasis laid on a part of an artistic design or composition; an emphasized detail, in particular a detail in sharp contrast to its surroundings.","example":null},{"definition":"A very small gemstone set into a piece of jewellery.","example":null},{"definition":"A distinctive feature or quality.","example":null},{"definition":"Utterance.","example":null}]
